name: Fast Canfield
description:
This Fast Canfield is a little different from the classic Canfield games, you can move the cards fast with more freedom and less limitations than the classics' , enjoy it and you're going to love it.

- Leaderboards for world ranking
- Unlimited undo and hints
- Auto complete
- Statistics
- Select photo from camera roll as background.
- Select music from library as background music.
